UserTour.title: User Tour
UserTour.subtitle: This is your first time using FormuLaTex. ðŸ¤—Do you need to simply show you how to use the software?

step1.whole: This is the QuickInput area where you can create and manage your formulas.
step1.createFormula-button: Click the New button to create a new formula.
step1.tags-list: This is the tag list where you can manage formulas under different categories.
step1.expression-list: This shows the formulas under the current tag. Right-click a formula to edit or delete it.

step2.whole: This is the SymbolSelect area where you can choose commonly used mathematical symbols.

step3.whole: This is the FormulaEditing & Preview area. You can edit formula content on the left and preview it on the right.
step3.tools-bar: This is the toolbar where you can choose the font, size, and color of the formula.
step3.simpleTexSetting-button: Click this settings button to import or update the SimpleTex ID and key (used for formula recognition).
step3.upload-button: Click the Upload Image button to recognize formulas in an image.
step3.askAI-button: Click the Ask AI button to jump to the AI chat area.

step4.whole: Click this button to open the AI chat panel, where you can ask any questions about formulas.
